topics.body:
"@Gizoid101":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552c60c16368722666200c00#post_552c60c16368722666200c00
[bq="Gizoid101"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552c5f7963687204dd900200#post_552c5f7963687204dd900200
@UH, HOW MUCH IS THAT LASER HAIR REMOVAL?@

"@Background Pony #FDEE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552c608263687204ddcc0300#post_552c608263687204ddcc0300
@HI KAZ@[/bq]
A good cheap one that isn't a fake runs about a $100, but it hurts like a bitch if you do it wrong.

Tips if you're interested:
Shave cause if you don't shave it'll burn the hair.
Make sure your skin is completely dry because if you just got out of the shower it'll intensify the laser and instead of flashing the hair follicles it'll instead burn your skin.

First time I used it I made the mistake of using it after a shower and my reaction was, "shit piss motherfucker!"

It's way cheaper than scheduling a hair care place to do it, but chances are the first couple of times you'll fuck up cause you haven't used it.  After that it doesn't sting cause you know what you're doing now.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552c5f7963687204dd900200#post_552c5f7963687204dd900200
[bq="uc9"]A bit of life stuff you can ignore:
I'm glad with my progression on transitioning.  What was slowing me down so much was that I was like a teddy bear when it came to body hair and it grew like a inch a month; sure for my scalp that's good and all but not good for my arms and legs.  I had to use a laser hair removal for a entire month everyday for it to start slowing down; now I only need to do it two days a week instead.  My facial hair may still be fuzzy, but at least it's no longer so thick that shaving would cause blisters.  Before on the scale of 1 to 10 on body hair I used to be chewbacca; now I'm about a 3.  It'll take a couple more months of laser hair removal to completely get rid of further growth, but it's definitely made a difference.

My voice sucks; it's going to take months to get a female sounding voice.

My butt is boney and I need to exercise.[/bq]
MY BUTT IS SOFT AND BIG AND SQUISHY.
